arStrings.szText: After {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} hits enemies {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times, your next {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} casts of {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} becomes waves that pierce and deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Critical Shock Damage.
